---
title: "NOCANCEL Property"
---
NOCANCEL Property
=================

The NOCANCEL Property will cause the "Cancel" button not to appear on a form.

This would typically be used on [subtab forms](SUBTABS.html) in which case it would be impossible not to save a form once it was opened (i.e. the only option would be to complete the form and to save it.

### Required Fields

**None**
